metadata.dc:author: Rioja Sanz, L A
Trivez Boned, M A
Gil Martínez, P
Andrés Lázaro, V
Oliva Encina, J
Borque Fernando, A
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of female 24 years old who had a blunt abdominal trauma. The immediate consequence was the radiological evidence of a left kidney abolition, secondary to a renal artery thrombosis. The treatment was conservative, and there was not a surgical procedure.
metadata.dc:title: Trombosis de la arteria renal secundaria a traumatismo abdominal cerrado.
[Thrombosis of the renal artery secondary to closed abdominal trauma].
